games.name: Alpha League Racing

games.name: Angrymals

games.description: Battle your friends in this byte-sized game of strategy, wits, and luck. Be the first to sink all your opponents' fleets.

games.description: Brawl online with real players for fun. Win matches to earn shards, spend them to buy cosmetic items for your brawler.
